rule: The output category must be more than a single word and must not match exactly one of the categories: World, Sports, Business, Sci/Tech.
input: Art exhibition showcases modern paintings in downtown gallery
validityText:
The input is a string as required by the input specification. The content of the input is about an art exhibition, which does not explicitly fit into the categories of World, Sports, Business, or Sci/Tech as specified in the input specification. The input specification requires the text to pertain to world events, sports, business, or science/technology topics, and art exhibitions do not clearly fall under any of these categories. Therefore, the input does not comply with the input specification because it does not aim to fit one of the provided content categories.

ERR
